thread.title: CBT Nuggets Announces VMware vSphere 6 Course
thread.title_full: CBT Nuggets Announces VMware vSphere 6 Course

author: Katherine Rice
title: CBT Nuggets Announces VMware vSphere 6 Course
text:
CBT Nuggets announces the release of a new video training course, "VMware vSphere 6 (VCP6-DCV)." This 12-hour video course focuses on VMware's flagship virtualization platform and discusses the core topics of installing, managing and administering a virtualized data center using VMware vSphere v6. Trainer Keith Barker provides a uniquely hands-on approach to the online training experience by walking learners through building a practice lab and exercises to apply skills and knowledge.
"I want [learners] to have the practical skills, due to building their own lab and practicing with me, Nugget by Nugget, so the skills they gain can make them more valuable to themselves and [to their] customers and employers." Barker said.
This training is associated with VMware's vSphere 6 VCP6-DCV certification.
"VMware vSphere 6 (VCP6-DCV)" is available as part of a CBT Nuggets subscription. Subscriptions are available for individuals or teams, and can be paid monthly or yearly.
About CBT Nuggets: CBT Nuggets creates on-demand IT training for individuals and teams that is available 24/7, from any device.
